nodes.text: The Lovers' Conflict was when the two moons of Elrood, Sharene and Lodos, were on opposite sides of the sky. Due to either a biological, psychological, or unknown factor, the violent crime rate on Elrood increased. A similar event on Elrood was known as The Lovers' Embrace, and the artwork "The Lovers' Dilemma" was displayed on the same planet.
